backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister defining admin login, access control, trucking domain types, and storage-backed data maps for clients, transporters, and loads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing modified UI files and components for restoring the Admin entry point in navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/.gitignore: Ignore rules for Node, build artifacts, environment files, IDE folders, and Capacitor platforms.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation describing the password‑based admin login flow, session token handling, and route protection logic.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing them for Play Store publishing.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, HTTPS scheme, and Android keystore build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Template environment file for Android keystore signing variables.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Shell script that builds a debug Android APK by checking prerequisites, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and invoking Gradle.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds a signed Android App Bundle, verifying signing creds and prerequisites, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle bundleRelease.
Builds a signed release APK for external distribution, checking signing creds and prerequisites, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleRelease.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component configuring React Query, theme provider, routing, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Displays submitted location evidence for a transporter with timestamps, coordinates, and screenshot viewing.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Lists transporters with details, live location info, and status freshness indicators.
Filter controls for hiding transporters without location and selecting truck type.
Shows a simple grid-based map view of transporters with location data and expandable detail sections.
Admin view that loads transporters with locations, applies filters, shows a map or fallback, and lists filtered transporters with status lookup.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an iframe preview of an ad snippet with load/error diagnostics and a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Displays a dismissible bottom advertisement using configured snippet settings and session-based dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with support contact and navigation options to home or admin login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary for admin routes that resets query state and displays a retry screen on errors.
UI for admin verification failures with retry and sign‑out actions that clear tokens and cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts users to sign in with admin credentials and provides support contact info.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling, and optional callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a basic user profile with name and email, using a save mutation and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that verifies admin status, handles redirects, and shows loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with company info, navigation links, coverage areas, and a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including top navigation, routed content, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements the top navigation bar with links, login handling, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Provides a dialog for uploading load interest evidence, capturing user location, and submitting both.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons if provided.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Card UI allowing transporters to start or stop sharing live location and view status updates.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: Lets transporters view and update their operational status with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Handles retrieval and comparison of a build-time admin bootstrap principal from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Contains ad configuration, default ad snippet, and functions to load or save bottom ad settings.
frontend/src/config/download.ts: Provides a fallback APK download URL loaded from environment variables.
frontend/src/constants/adminToken.ts: Defines shared constants for admin token storage and change event names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutations to grant or bootstrap admin access, invalidating related admin role queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token from sessionStorage and updates reactively when it changes via custom events.
Verifies admin access by initializing the actor with the admin token and exposes a hook-powered verification helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, profile, role, and admin-token state to compute overall authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login/logout functions, and status handling via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple data queries and mutations using the backend actor for admin checks, clients, contact info, and other domain entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Handles periodic transporter geolocation updates, including permission errors and mutation calls to persist the location.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller’s user profile and role, only enabling queries when authenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a detailed About page with company story, mission, values, and regional coverage using card components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements a complex admin dashboard with data fetching, approvals, verification actions, APK link settings, and tabbed management views.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Provides an admin password login form with diagnostic tracking, token handling, and backend verification flow.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Displays a client registration form with validation, contract entry, and submission via backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Offers a contact form for users to send messages and shows company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: UI for viewing and posting contracts, including form validation, date handling, verification checks, and listing existing contracts.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPage.tsx: Displays Android APK download link using backend or fallback URL with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, company info, testimonials, and registration CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Load board for clients and transporters with load posting, file uploads, load browsing, and verification checks.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Static presentation of company services and workflow steps.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Transporter registration form with document uploads, truck type selection, and prefill of existing details.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the React Router route tree with hash-based history and all app page routes.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides a function to convert objects to CSV and trigger a file download in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, features, issues, and pending requests.
